name: General Things
overview:
General Things Inc. is a San Francisco based web consultancy that offers solutions to problems you didn’t think existed. They are an established development leader in many emerging fields including social networks, blogs, content management systems (CMS), Ruby on Rails, and Drupal site development.

Their expertise spans through the entire breadth of emerging technologies. Their services include business and information technology strategy, development, and management; office, network, server, datacenter, and general IT design, integration, and administration; Web and mobile application development; and Open Source and open standards-based strategy and execution.

With a passion for technology and a love for eccentricity, they continue to create genius offerings for their clients. Contact us if you are interested in innovative technology that is custom built to your preferences.
